function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential lack of standardised data collection methods","Impact":"Risk of inconsistent and inaccurate data collection, leading to compromised analysis and decision-making","Mitigation":"Implement standardized data collection protocols and provide training to data owners","Technologies":"Data collection automation tools, data quality validation algorithms","People":"Data owners, analysts, clinical participants","Owner":"Data owners, data governance bodies"},{"Description":"Unequal resource reliance in federated approaches","Impact":"Unequal distribution of resources can lead to disparities in data quality and analysis capabilities","Mitigation":"Provide equitable resources and support for all federated approaches","Technologies":"Resource monitoring and allocation tools, federated data quality assurance systems","People":"System administrators, data owners, federated network participants","Owner":"Data governance bodies, federated network administrators"},{"Description":"Inability to directly interact and view data in federated systems","Impact":"Limited ability to identify potential distortions and anomalies in the data","Mitigation":"Implement transparency and traceability features in data handling, and provide training for data analysts","Technologies":"Data transparency tools, anomaly detection algorithms","People":"Data analysts, data owners, system administrators","Owner":"Data owners, federated network administrators"}]}
